p: Probit analyses were carried out to determine the curves of lethal dose and concentration of the essential oils of the two H. pectinata chemotypes and the major compounds for each ant species. Curves with probability ( p < 0.05) of acceptance of the null hypothesis were accepted by the Ï‡ 2 test. Lethal doses (LD 50 and LD 90) and lethal concentrations (LC 50 and LC 90), and their respective confidence intervals at 95% probability (CI 95) were obtained in the SAS software (version 9.1, Cary, NC, USA), by using these curves [ 69].
